caption: As the twin wolves journey forth, they embark on a treasure hunt deep within a forest situated several kilometers away. However, they must tread cautiously to avoid fatigue from the sandy terrain. Their mother accompanies them, aiding in their quest to locate creatures they've lost touch with. Key highlights from the narrative include the twin wolves' venture in search of hidden treasures within the forest, all while evading the debilitating effects of the sand. Their mother plays a pivotal role in this journey, assisting in tracking down lost beings. Even as the wolves emerge from the sandy terrains, showing signs of weariness, their mother remains vigilant, closely watching over them.
